attributes.action: The people decided - Exit the EU now !
attributes.additional_details: Eire voted once - obviously wrongly according to the EU ...they were told to go back and get the answer right ..I think the same is going to happen in the UK
attributes.background: The remain camp are crying foul !!! But the people decided - we were told that this was a one off chance ...no matter what happened ...Remain obviously think different.
